features.batteryDesc: Advanced testing and optimization for maximum range
features.drivetrainDesc: Expert maintenance for motors and power electronics

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At "MB Center" specialized Mercedes-Benz service, we strive to provide the highest quality service to our customers, constantly improving our services and products. Our main goal is to create long-lasting and trusting relationships with each client, providing them with reliable and innovative solutions for their vehicles.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose "MB Center"?
whyChoose.content: We are proud to specialize in the Mercedes-Benz brand and offer a wide variety of new auto parts, original accessories, and high-quality consumables for your vehicles. Our products are carefully selected to meet the requirements of the most demanding customers who seek uncompromising quality and reliability.

expertService.title: Expert Service
expertService.content: Our qualified technicians are available to help you with service and maintenance of your vehicles. With years of experience and knowledge in the industry, we ensure professional treatment and individual approach to every Mercedes-Benz vehicle.

carsForSale.title: Cars for Sale
carsForSale.content: In addition, we offer a wide range of Mercedes-Benz vehicles for sale. Our consultants will be happy to help you choose the perfect vehicle that meets your needs and preferences.

allClients.title: We Serve All Clients
allClients.content: At "MB Center" we value diversity and work with both private individuals and business clients. Whether you are an individual vehicle owner or represent a company with its own fleet, you will receive professional and individual service that meets your needs.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Contact us today and find out why so many customers trust our products and services. Our team is ready to help you with everything you need.
cta.content: Together with MB Center, we will turn the care of your Mercedes-Benz into a real pleasure. Contact us today and find out why so many customers trust our products and services.
